definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: XuanZu pretends to zen to light the sea king, to test the courtiers faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 宣祖假裝要禪位給光海君，以此試探臣子們的忠心。

sentences.english: Year in October, immediately forced the Han Xiandi abdicate the throne, self-reliance for the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 當年十月，立刻逼迫漢獻帝禪位，自立爲皇帝。
